resources.string: No stock quote available. Click the button to add a stock
No stock quote available. The network is not available to fetch data.
No stock quote available. The server is not returning data.
No stock quote available. The server is not returning valid data. Please check for an updated version.
The server is not returning valid data. Please check for an updated version.
No quote server available. The symbol is not recognized by the quote server.

There are a few key points within the layout file that you need to be aware of. To use the bottom sheets widget, you must use a CoordinatorLayout container for the views. Towards the bottom of the file, you notice that there is a NestedScrollView containing a TextView.
button for adding new stock symbol
